message: Let's split the money 60/40. This offer benefits both of us, but it's in our best interest to settle now before inflation erodes the value.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair deal. If we don't settle now, the money will be worth less in the next round.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value is decreasing faster for you than it is for me. My offer is 55/45. It's the best you'll get at this point.
I understand the pressure of inflation, but I still believe we can meet in the middle. 52/48 is my final offer before things get worse.
